content: the suzette stitch is also known as the thicket stitch it is a lovely beginner friendly crochet stitch that is created by making single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet stitches in a specific stitch for every round the teen adult small size hat used 2 1 oz 61 g and 112 yds 102 m the suzette crochet hat is made from the top-down in one piece ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesign/ **youtube ** https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confirmation=1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/oombawkadesign/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter #oombawka @oombawkadesigncrochet #odcmakers © 2021 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
